name: Substrate Mining Co.
description:
Substrate Mining Co. is a narrative-exploration game. 

You are a lone explorer, delving into the abandoned Mining Project 42-B of the Substrate Mining Company. All you have with you is a torch and a map.

Discover what happened here. There's no one else left to.

Whether you've uncovered all it's secrets, or are just passing through the mine, when you think you're ready to leave, press X.

Controls:

A D to walk

W S to move on ladders

M to check map

Press X to leave at any time, when you feel you're ready to leave

Credits:

RomanEmpire - Lead Programmer

Ilyas Aqil - Narrative Designer

Draconic Chipmunk - Creative Director and Artist
